title: Disha Patani gets trolled for wearing 'revealing' dress, posts befitting response! | Zee News
text:
Disha Patani gets trolled for wearing 'revealing' dress, posts befitting response! By Raghav Jaitly | Last Updated: Friday, February 24, 2017 - 15:56 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: The new-age Bollywood brigade aptly knows how to shut down online trolls with their befitting replies. They keep their head high with charm and grace. Recently, actress Disha Patani did something similar when she was being slammed on Instagram. 
The 24-year-old actress on Tuesday posted a heartfelt message on her social media page in the form on an image. "Really felt a need to share this! thanks to my fan clubs friends and family for always giving me the strength i hope we all can find this strength from within each other and stop suffering #spreadlove," she captioned the note. A post shared by disha patani (paatni) (@dishapatani) on Feb 21, 2017 at 2:59am PST 
For the record, the 'MS Dhoni: The Untold Story' diva was being criticised for wearing a black dress to an award show. Strangely, she is not the only celeb who has been targeted on the internet. A number of celebrities have been trolled in the past too. 
On the professional front, she is enjoying the Box Office success of her latest release Jackie Chan starrer 'Kung Fu Yoga'. First Published: Friday, February 24, 2017 - 15:56 More from zeenews
